data.title: Happy Friday! Jack Dann Masters of Science Fiction Series by Jack Dann edited by John Pelan ©2022 Centipede Press Signed Edition limited...
data.meta_description:
17 likes, 0 comments - bookpurveyor on March 3, 2023: "Happy Friday!

Jack Dann
Masters of Science Fiction Series
by Jack Dann
edited by John Pelan

©2022 Centipede Press
Signed Edition limited to 500 copies, of which this is numbered 359
Wraparound jacket art by Jim & Ruth Keegan
Introduction by George Zebrowski
SIGNED by the author Jack Dann
SIGNED by George Zebrowski
SIGNED by Jim & Ruth Keegan
Hardcover in dust jacket
752 pages

About: This is part of Centipede's Masters of Science Fiction Series.  This large 752 page volume collects over 25 of his stories, including award winners.  Just scratches the surface of his overall body of work.

Book features:

  Limited to an edition of 500 numbered copies
  Signed by the author Jack Dann
  Signed by George Zebrowski
  Signed by Jim & Ruth Keegan
  Ribbon marker, head and tail bands
  Wraparound jacket art by Jim & Ruth Keegan
  Introduction by George Zebrowski
  Afterword by John Pelan

#jackdann #centipedepress #limitededition #fantasy #sciencefiction #jimkeegan #ruthkeegan #johnpelan #scifi #booksbooksbooks #ilovebooks #bibliophile #bookhoarder".
